description: Learn Implicit ALS: Collaborative Filtering at Scale in one minute.

hook.text: Spotify has billions of implicit plays, not star ratings. ALS handles this natively.

buildup.text: Alternating Least Squares (ALS) optimizes user and item factors by alternating between them.

discovery.text: For implicit data, ALS treats interactions as confidence levels rather than explicit preferences.
